description:
Ja`far is the advisor of http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad] and one of the Eight Generals of http://anidb.net/ch63616 [Sindria Kingdom]. He is a serious person, who gets angry easily and most often is the voice of reason when Sinbad is doing something outrageous.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Ja`far
